14159.「待たせたな。来たぜ～ ガウラド。: Sorry to keep you waiting. Here I am~ Gaurad.

14160.「<cs_pchero>殿も 来たのですか。\n いいでしょう。歓迎いたしますよ:
<cs_pchero> is here too? That's fine. You
are welcome.

14161.「で なんの用なんだ？\n お小言なら もう聞きたくないぜ。\n マジメに やっ:
So what do you want? I don't want to hear any
more of your complaints. I'm trying to be
serious.

14163.「は？ 何を言ってるんだ ガウラド。: Huh? What are you talking about, Gaurad.

14164.「超天道士の名を持つ者と\n やっと 闘える日が来ました。:
The day has come when I can fight someone who
goes by the name of "Choten Doshi".

14166.「おいおい。お前の じょうだんは\n 相変わらず つまんねえなあ。\n もっと:
Hey, hey, hey. Your jokes are as boring as
ever. Make it more funny.

14167.「超天道士を名乗る者を殺し\n その名に宿りし チカラを得る……。\n それが:
My mission is to kill those who claim to be
supernatural beings and to gain the power that
resides in their names.

14169.<pipipi_mid>「超天道士を倒すため 魔界より訪れた使者。\n 武闘魔ガ:
<pipipi_mid>The messenger who came from Demon
World to defeat Chotendoji. Warrior Demon
Gaurad...that is my true form.

14170.「だが なんということか……。\n 私が目的を果たさんとしたとき 超天道士は\n:
But lo and behold... just as I was about to
fulfill my goal, the Supernaturalist became
ill and was about to die.

14171.「そんな おとろえた超天道士を倒しても\n チカラを得ることなど できぬ！\n:
I cannot gain power by defeating such a
moribund supernatural being! I will only
defeat the perfect Chosen One!

14172.「だから 待ったのだ。\n 超天道士の名を継ぐ者が現れる その日を！\n 貴様を:
That's why I waited. The day when Heir to a
Name will appear! If I defeat you, my mission
will be fulfilled!

14173.「くだらねえ……。\n そんなことのために お前は これまで\n オレの世話をし:
You've been taking care of me all this time
for this crap?

14174.「ヤーン！ 超天道士の名を継ぐ者よ！\n さあ 私と闘え！\n そして そのチカ:
Yarn! Heir to a Name! Come, fight me! And give
me your power!

14175.「イヤだね。オレは お前の相手なんか\n これっぽっちも する気ね～よ。:
I don't like it. I don't want to deal with you
in the slightest.

14176.「超天道士の名を継ぐ者が 逃げるのか！？:
Heir to a Name, the Chotenkyoji, is running
away!

14177.「ちげ～っつーの。お前なんかじゃ\n オレの相手にならね～って 言ってるんだよ。:
That's not true. I'm saying you're no match
for me.

14178.「……そうだな。コイツに勝てたら\n お前の相手をしてやっても いいぜ。:
Well...yeah. If you can beat him, I'll be
happy to play with you.

14179.「<cs_pchero> 悪いが頼むぜ。\n アンタの闘いを 見せてやってくれよ:
<cs_pchero> I'm sorry, but please. Show them
what you're fighting for.

14180.「ガウラド。お前じゃ <cs_pchero>を\n 倒すなんて できね～と思うぜ:
Gaurad. I don't think you can defeat
<cs_pchero>.

14181.「<cs_pchero>を倒せば 貴様が\n この私と闘うと いうのだな……。\:
If I defeat <cs_pchero>, you will fight
me... Is there any doubt in your mind?

14182.「<cs_pchero>よ。まずは貴様からだ。\n さあ 私の使命のため 消える:
<cs_pchero>. You first. Now, vanish for the
sake of my mission!

14183.「まさか……。超天道士の名を持たぬ者に\n この私が 敗れる……だと！？:
No way... that I would be defeated by someone
who does not have the name of Chotenkyoji?

14184.「名前に チカラが宿るわけじゃない。\n お前がしてることには なんの意味もね～:
Names don't have power. What you're doing
means nothing.

14185.「超天道士の名なんか 継いでなくても\n <cs_pchero>は こんだけ 強:
Even if he didn't inherit the name of a
supernatural being, <cs_pchero> is still as
strong as ever.

14186.「だが 私は 超天道士を倒さねば……。\n 使命を果たさねば 魔界へ帰ることはで:
But I must defeat the Chosen One... and
complete my mission or I will never return to
Demon World!

14188.「わかった。オレが相手をしてやる。: I'll take care of it. I'll deal with him.

14189.「フフ……。なんという強さ……。\n さすが 超天……道士……の……。:
Fufu... what strength... as expected of a
super heavenly... wayward...

14190.「なあ ガウラド……。オレと お前はさ。\n ずいぶん長く 一緒に暮らしてたよな:
You know, Gaurad... you and I... You and I
have been living together for a long time.
I've said many selfish things...

14191.「じ～さんが死んだ後も お前がオレの世話を\n 焼いてくれたのは そんな くだら:
You took care of me even after your
grandfather died, and it wasn't just for that
stupid mission, was it?

14192.「なのに なぜ いつまでも\n そんな使命に こだわってさ……。\n こんなこと:
So why did you persist in this mission... and
do this...

14193.「貴様には わかるまい……。\n 魔界に生きる者に 課せられた使命の重さを。:
You have no idea the weight of the mission
that is placed on those who live in Demon
World.

14194.「だが……。だが なぜ私は\n その使命を果たさねば ならなかったのか……。\n:
But... but why I had to fulfill that mission I
don't remember now.

14195.「いつからか 私は 理由もなく\n ただ 与えられた使命を果たすためだけに\n:
Somewhere along the way, I seem to have lived
my life without reason, just to fulfill the
mission I was given...

14196.「……使命のことは もう忘れちまえ。\n そして ゆっくり眠れば いいさ。:
Forget about the mission. And get a good
night's sleep.

14197.「せめて 最期は……。あなたの知る姿で……。:
At least... in your last moments... as you
know them...

14198.「私は 使命を果たすことに囚われ……。\n 安息の日など 一日たりとも\n 訪れ:
I was so caught up in fulfilling my mission
that not a single day of rest ever came...

14199.「ただ……なぜか……\n あなたと共に暮らした日々は……。:
It's just... somehow... the days I spent with
you...

14200.「とても 楽しかっ……た……。: It was a lot of fun...

14203.「中に コレが入ってたよ。\n 武闘家の証……って 言われてるヤツだ。:
I found this inside. It's called the Proof of
MRT.

14204.「超天道士が死ぬ間際に オレに渡せと言って\n ガウラドのヤツに あずけたらしい:
The supernaturalist gave it to Gaurad to give
to me when he was dying. That's what it says
in this letter...

14205.「大事に 持ってやがったんだなあ。\n アイツの使命とは 関係ないモノだろうに。:
He must have taken good care of it. It has
nothing to do with his mission.

14206.「……なあ <cs_pchero>。\n 突然だけどさ。オレと勝負してくれよ。\:
...Hey <cs_pchero>. Hey <cs_pchero>, I
know it's sudden, but... I'd like you to play
with me. I want to make sure of something.

14207.「アンタと拳を交えれば きっと\n その答えが わかるはずなんだよ。:
I'm sure I'll know the answer to that question
when I get into a fist fight with you.

14208.「本格的に コロシアムで やろうぜ。\n そこの関係者の グララってオーガの女に:
Let's do it in earnest at the Coliseum. I've
already talked to an ogre woman named Grala
who works there.

14209.「オレは ジュレットの町に ヤボ用がある。\n アンタは 先に ラッカラン島の\:
I have some business in Julet Town. I want you
to go to the Coliseum on Luckland Island
first.

14210.「<cs_pchero> 今度は イケるよな。\n これまでの修行を 思いだせば:
<cs_pchero> You'll be good this time. Just
remember what you've been through. I know you
can do it.

14211.「ヤーン。まだ貴様は 闘おうとしないのか？\n 私の使命は 超天道士の名を持つ貴:
Yarn. Still you will not fight? My mission
will not be fulfilled until I defeat you, who
bear the name of the Chosen One!

14212.「<cs_pchero>は まだ 負けてね～よ。\n お前の前で 倒れてるか？\:
<cs_pchero> hasn't lost yet~. Is he down in
front of you? Is he getting up and trying to
fight?

14213.「……相変わらず クチの減らない男だ。\n よかろう。ならば 今度は完全に\n:
...as usual, a man who never loses his mouth.
Very well. Then this time I'll beat you to a
pulp!

14214.「よく来てくれた～ <cs_pchero>。\n ここなら ジャマも入らないだろ:
Thanks for coming~ <cs_pchero>. No jammers
in here, right?

14215.「アンタと 拳を交えれば\n オレが確かめたいことの 答えが出るんだ。\n だか:
If I get into a fist fight with you, I'll get
the answer to what I want to find out. So
please don't go easy on me.

14216.「……もう 言葉は いらないよな。\n あとは 拳で語り合おうぜ。:
We don't need any more words, do we? Let's
talk about the rest with our fists.

14218.「<cs_pchero>……。アンタなら\n また来てくれると 思ってたぜ～。:
<cs_pchero>... I knew you'd come back for
more!

14219.「勝負は まだ ついてないよな？\n <pc>の本気を オレは\n まだ 見せて:
You haven't won yet, have you? I haven't had a
chance to see what <pc> is really
made of yet!

14220.「今度は 見せてくれよ～。\n <cs_pchero>の 本気の拳をな！！:
Let's see it this time~! Let's see the real
fist of <cs_pchero>!

14221.「ははっ 強いなあ～ <cs_pchero>。\n 超天道士の名を継いだオレが:
You are so strong~ <cs_pchero>. I, who
inherited the name of Chotendo-sensei, lost.

14222.「だが ずっと 確かめたかったことが\n アンタと闘って やっと わかった。\n:
But I finally figured out what I've been
wanting to be sure of since I've been fighting
you. Will you ask me what it is?

14223.「……オレが じ～さんに弟子入りしたのは\n 超天道士って名が 欲しかったからじ:
I didn't become your apprentice because I
wanted the name "Chotendoji. It was because I
admired his strength.

14224.「その名を継がなくても 超天道士を超える強さを\n 身につけられると オレは信じ:
I believed that even if I didn't inherit the
name, I could acquire strength beyond that of
a supernatural being.

14225.「だから ずっと 名を継ぐことを避けてたのさ。\n 本気のじ～さんと闘って 勝つ:
That's why I've been avoiding taking over the
name. Until the day came when I could really
fight and win against the old man...

14227.「……本当はさ。超天道士の名を継いだ\n アンタと闘って 勝つつもりだったんだ。:
The truth is. I was going to fight you, the
heir to the Chotentoshi name, and win. But it
turned out the other way around.

14228.「だが 超天道士の名を継いだ このオレを\n アンタが 超えてみせてくれた。:
But you have surpassed me, the heir to the
name of Chotenkyoji.

14229.「名前が強さを もたらすわけじゃない。\n 強さってのは 人に宿るってことが\n:
A name does not bring strength. I can finally
confirm that strength resides in people...

14230.「よし……っと。\n <cs_pchero>のおかげで\n いろいろと ふっきれ:
Well...here we go. Thanks to <cs_pchero>,
I'm all set.

14231.「超天道士の名は 今やオレの身体の一部だ。\n この名と共に オレは生きていくよ:
The name "Chotentoshi" is now a part of me. I
will live with this name.

14232.「<cs_pchero>～！\n アンタとの勝負は 本当に楽しかったぜ。:
<cs_pchero>~! I really enjoyed playing with
you.

14233.「アンタは いい武闘家になるよ。\n 超天道士のように 伝説に名を残す\n そん:
You'll be a good martial artist. You'll be a
great martial artist, like the legendary
Choten Doshi.

14234.「このオレが 言うんだ。\n 絶対に まちがいね～って！:
I'm the one who's going to tell you. I'm
telling you, we're not fuckin' wrong!

14235.「オレに勝ったんだからな。\n コレは アンタに受け取ってほしい。\n ガウラド:
You beat me. I want you to take this. It's the
Proof of MRT that Gaurad left behind.

14236.「その武闘家の証は いつか オレが\n 証に ふさわしい男になる日まで\n アン:
I'll leave that Proof of MRT to you until the
day I become a man worthy of it.

14237.「勝者への ごほうびだ。\n コレを アンタに贈らせてもらおう。: A reward for the winner. This is for you.

14238.「オレも 超天道士の名に恥じない\n 武闘家にならなきゃ いけね～からな。\n:
I must become a martial artist who lives up to
the name of Chotendo-sensei. I'll work even
harder on my training.

14239.「今度 闘うことがあったら 絶対に負けないぜ。\n 超天道士の名に かけてな！:
If we ever fight again, I'll never lose. In
the name of Chotendo-sensei!
